Workshop 10

The tenth Epigraphy.info workshop will take place in Graz (Austria) from 24 to 26 April 2026.

The workshop traditionally brings together researchers and enthusiasts of digital epigraphy to discuss the current trends and issues of the discipline (browse the Epigraphy.info website for details of previous workshops).

More info to follow soon!

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Epigraphy.info Steering Committee (info@epigraphy.info).

Members the Steering Committee and the local organisers

Subscribe via RSS

Epigraphy.info is an international open community pursuing a collaborative environment for digital epigraphy, which facilitates scholarly communication and interaction.
